LanguageData.ComponentHeavyCasting.label: heavy compoment
LanguageData.ComponentHeavyCasting.description: large metal parts such as cylinders, cranks, manifolds and turbine blades.
LanguageData.UnfinishedEngine.label: unfinished engine
LanguageData.UnfinishedEngine.description: An unfinished / in-disassemble engine of some kind.
LanguageData.EngineLight.label: light engine
LanguageData.EngineLight.description: two-stroke cycle engine,it is simple and produce a large torque, but the fuel consumption is relatively higher.
LanguageData.EngineSteam.label: steam engine
LanguageData.EngineSteam.description: a heat engine that performs mechanical work using steam as its working fluid, it's common used by early industrial vehicles such as steam tractor and truck.
LanguageData.EngineMedium.label: engine
LanguageData.EngineMedium.description: a Four-stroke engine with optimum fuel conversion, it is the heart of an industrial world.
LanguageData.EngineHeavy.label: heavy engine
LanguageData.EngineHeavy.description: an six cylender distel engine with powerful torque, it is commonly used by heavy vehicles and ships.
LanguageData.EngineJet.label: turbojet
LanguageData.EngineJet.description: an airbreathing jet engine which is typically used in aircraft, consists of a gas turbine with a propelling nozzle.
LanguageData.EngineTurbine.label: turbine engine
LanguageData.EngineTurbine.description: An engine powered by gas expansion driving turbine blades, but fuel consumption is quite high. widely used in pre-spacer jets and military vehicles.
